title: Epistemic Network Analysis-Based Mathematical Learning Design for Online Collaborative Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics Knowledge and Experience with Online Collaboration Tools
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment for office/administrative professionals in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze social and cognitive interactions required for solving math problems in online collaboration tools and improve collaboration strategies.
Learners can visualize and interpret idea-exchange patterns occurring during collaborative processes using ENA (Epistemic Network Analysis).
Learners can demonstrate collaboration problem-solving competencies over time through project-based assessment.

resources: ENA Analysis Tool (e.g., ENA Web App)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
